name: p7d-markdown-it-footnote-here
description: adds aside[role|doc-footnote] element just below the footnote reference paragraph.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.disableBuiltin.description: When false (default), this extension disables VS Code's built-in footnote processing for the markdown-it instance used by this extension.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.disableStyle.description: Disable the default CSS of p7d-markdown-it-footnote-here.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.beforeSameBack.description: Add letter suffixes (a, b, c, ...) to duplicate footnote references and backlinks.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.afterBacklink.description: Place backlinks at the end of footnote content instead of before it.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.afterBacklinkC.description: Content to display for the after-backlink. If empty, uses U+21A9.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.afterBacklinkW.description: Show a number or letter suffix after after-backlinks.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.afterBacklinkS.description: Use Arabic numerals (1, 2, ...) for after-backlink suffixes instead of letters.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.afterBacklinkd.description: Prefix for aria-label on after-backlinks. If empty, uses "Back to reference" plus a trailing space.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.labelBra.description: Bracket to place before footnote reference numbers. If empty, uses "[".

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.labelKet.description: Bracket to place after footnote reference numbers. If empty, uses "]".

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.labelSupTag.description: Wrap footnote references in a sup tag.

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.backLabelBra.description: Bracket to place before backlink numbers. If empty, uses "[".

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.backLabelKet.description: Bracket to place after backlink numbers. If empty, uses "]".

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.endnotesPrefix.description: Prefix that marks a footnote as an endnote. If empty, uses "en-".

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.endnotesLabelP.description: Label prefix for endnote references and backlinks. If empty, uses "E".

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.endnotesSectio.description: Id attribute for the endnotes section wrapper. If empty, uses "endnotes".
Class attribute for the endnotes section wrapper. If empty, no class is added.
Aria-label text or heading text for the endnotes section. If empty, uses "Notes".

p7dMarkdownItFootnoteHere.endnotesUseHea.description: Render a heading in the endnotes section instead of aria-label.
